divs: Sighting DetailsWas at a gathering and laying on my back watching the skies and noticed a bright light that didn;t blink, First I thought it was a plane then it shot to the right at a 90 degree angle then stopped and went to the left in a 90 degree angle and kept randomly changing pattenrns.
Summary: Star like object moved in the sky diffrent directions
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bowdon
This sighting has never been favorited.
